name: Feudal Felines
description:
Hear ye, hear ye, Feudal Felines! Let it be known that no cat shall ever be made to fetch their own sustenance ever again! Utilize these loathsome peasants! They will no longer reject and demonize us! Charm them and rule your Feline Fiefdom!

Feudal Felines: a digital card game for 4 players

https://playingcards.io/tbd4x7
